name: A leather wrapped burnished buckler
data: It increases the users wisdom an average amount.
It increases the users intelligence an average amount.
It increases the users hitpoints unbelievably much.
It has decent armour class for its type (weak in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users physical resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
